data.eml:eml: Species of the genus Neoperla (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from Henan, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Weihai, Wang, Hongliang, Lu, Wenyan (2011): Species of the genus Neoperla (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from Henan, China. Zootaxa 2735: 57-63, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207698
